clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: High-resolution linear and curvilinear probes used for detailed evaluation.
findings: Urinary bladder is well-defined, no intraluminal lesions.
Major vessels show coarse waveform on Doppler.
Breast tissue shows ill-defined lesion measuring 30.99 mm.
Thyroid gland shows mildly heterogeneous echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
impression: Appearance concerning for possible malignancy—correlate clinically.
